entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 10:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

Humidity: 66 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
